attributes.action: Ensure public health and safety by ensuring household waste is collected at least weekly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that the health and safety of our nation demands a household refuse collection at least weekly - in the summer months perhaps more frequently. Nobody wants our citizens, especially children, the elderly and vulnerable groups to endure unpleasant odours, a risk of disease, or the discovery of maggots or rats as a result of their waste not being collected. It’s also a false economy from a Council Tax payer’s viewpoint, as I suspect that fly tipping will increase as a result of infrequent waste collection. Sign up if you agree!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
